fr.escape.input

Interface EventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Overlay, Screen
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIntro, AbstractOverlay, Error, Escape, Game, IngameUI, Lost, Menu, Splash, UIHighscore, UIWeapons, Victory

    public interface EventListener

    An interface for Listener which need to handle Input Event such touch or move

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean move(Input i)
      Move Input Event
      boolean touch(Input i)
      Touch Input Event

    • Method Detail

      • touch

        boolean touch(Input i)
        Touch Input Event
        Parameters:
        i - Input Event of type touch.
        Returns:
        True if the EventListener handle it.

      • move

        boolean move(Input i)
        Move Input Event
        Parameters:
        i - Input Event of type move.
        Returns:
        True if the EventListener handle it.
